Even with the resources of the federation behind us, we depend on civilians like Banker Kerson to help with services like mail delivery and transporting supplies.

To keep this relationship strong, we often "lend" people out for special favors. He's got a small problem with one of our couriers...can you see what he needs, and possibly give him a hand?

Attend! I have a problem. Chione's a pilot who flies one of those airships around the island.

At least...she did before she crashed it heading to the Tainted Gorge.

She's still out there dealing with her mistake, but I've got mail stacking up, and Ramun won't carry it in his pack.

Chione's route goes east from here, then curves to the south. Find out what the holdup is—my reputation's at risk!

Do not judge Chione by the results of one miscalculation—instead, join her in addressing a serious problem.

The airship was perfectly balanced, the supplies were securely fastened. No one could have forseen stowaways—or that they'd cause a crash.

Now all that can be done is to guard the cargo until a repair ship arrives.
